review: EXCELLENT product worth every penny.  Does exactly what it's supposed to seamlessly!
author: vanman "Ace"

review: I am very pleased with my purchase. I am able to stream movies and videos on my tv. It is a much more pleasant experience than watching them on a small device. The set up was very easy and I was able to start using the Fire Stick in 10 minutes. I highly recommend it.The only slight negative is that using the USB connection, instead of the power adapter, causes the video to stall at times.
author: Justagal

review: Never could get my Chromecast to work. Replaced it with the Fire Stick.  This Amazon Fire Stick was so easy to set up and works perfectly. I absolutely love it.
author: Janis D.

review: Turned my TV into a smart TV.  My Netflix, HBO Go, YOUTUBE, ESPN, all work great. Lots of games too.
author: Steven Nakamura

review: Turned our basic TV in the bedroom into a smart TV for $40. I'm a long time prime member so this was an obvious choice. We used to use a noisy PS3, so the best thing about this for me is its quiet, which might sound weird but is incredibly important in the bedroom.

review: I have to say this thing is awesome. The picture quality and sound are outstanding. Easy to hook up and activate. Great product Amazon. Love it.
